name.vi: Giấy phép Công cộng Mozilla, phiên bản 1.1
name.ja: Mozilla Public License バージョン 1.1
name.zh-CN: Mozilla 公共许可协议，版本 1.1

release_notes.en-US:
• Addition of Japanese locale
  • Fixed some compliance issues.

description.en-US: Flat Folder Tree enables you to selectively breakout sub-folders under intermediate folders in the folder pane view. It does not alter your Thunderbird folder hierarchy or message storage. Instead, this add-on implements another folder pane view side-by-side with the existing ones like All, Unread, Unified, Recent and Favorites. That is, a new view named "Flattened" is added to the list of choices you have for folder views. After installing this add-on, three new commands will be added to the context menu of each folder in the folder tree view. Breakout Subfolders This option brings out the subfolders of the selected folder and hides the parent folder itself. This is perfect for breaking out the special [Gmail] namespace imposed by Google Mail. Promote Subfolders This option brings out the subfolders of the selected folder and still keeps the parent folder visible. This is perfect for IMAP servers where special folders are stored under INBOX. Restore Parent Folder This option resets the selected folder's siblings and parent folder to their initial state.
description.de: Flat Folder Tree enables you to selectively breakout sub-folders under intermediate folders in the folder pane view. It does not alter your Thunderbird folder hierarchy or message storage. Instead, this add-on implements another folder pane view side-by-side with the existing ones like All, Unread, Unified, Recent and Favorites. That is, a new view named "Flattened" is added to the list of choices you have for folder views. After installing this add-on, three new commands will be added to the context menu of each folder in the folder tree view. Breakout Subfolders This option brings out the subfolders of the selected folder and hides the parent folder itself. This is perfect for breaking out the special [Google Mail] namespace imposed by Google Mail. Promote Subfolders This option brings out the subfolders of the selected folder and still keeps the parent folder visible. This is perfect for IMAP servers where special folders are stored under INBOX. Restore Parent Folder This option resets the selected folder's siblings and parent folder to their initial state.

developer_comments.en-US:
Please suggest correct translations for the following strings in your native language. Your language will be added in the next version:
  1. Breakout Subfolders
  2. Promote Subfolders
  3. Restore Parent Folder
  4. Flattened
  5. Flattened Folders

summary.en-US: Selectively breakout or promote sub-folders under an intermediate folder in the folder tree. Use with IMAP servers where some folders remain collapsed under special namespace like [Gmail] or the INBOX itself.
summary.de: Selectively breakout or promote sub-folders under an intermediate folder in the folder tree. Use with IMAP servers where some folders remain collapsed under special namespace (e.g. in Google Mail) or the INBOX itself.
